department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Requirement for one new V Hull Aluminum vessel (up to 6.4 meters with hard top) by the Wildlife Enforcement Directorate of ECCC.
description: The Wildlife Enforcement Directorate of ECCC has a requirement for one new V Hull Aluminum vessel, a minimum of 5.5 meters not including an extended transom, up to a maximum of 6.4 meters with or without an extended transom.  The vessel must be equipped with center console and hard top (TTop).
full_summary:
# Canadian Government Tender Notice for Aluminum Boat

**Official Government Tender Notice**

## Announcement Details

* Tender Title: K0E75-230415 Aluminum Boat
* Reference Number: WS3732921023
* Amendment Number: 1
* Solicitation Number: WS3732921023
* Publication Date: November 15, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: December 13, 2022, at 2:00 PM (EST)
* Amendment Date: December 5, 2022
* Expected Contract Start Date: December 20, 2022
* Expected Contract End Date: December 20, 2023
* Tender Status: Cancelled

## Procurement Details

* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Procurement Method: Competitive Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Delivery Requirements

* Regions of Delivery: British Columbia
* Type of Goods: Commercial Marine Craft
* Description of Goods: One (1) new V Hull Aluminum vessel, minimum length of 5.5 meters, and maximum length of 6.4 meters, including an extended transom

## End User Organization

* Department of the Environment (ECCC)
* Contact Information:
	+ Name: Smith, Jason
	+ Email: jason.smith@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
	+ Phone: Not Available

## Notice URL

* http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14643795?extsite=MTQ2NDM3OTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## Other Details

* Regions of Opportunity: None
* Countries/Regions: Canada
* Contracting Entity Address:
	+ 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
	+ Gatineau, Quebec, Canada, K1A 0S5

Note: As per the original text, there are some fields that are left blank. You can ignore those. The ownership and the end-user requirements have been extracted and made prominent, with key details like phone number, etc. being focused upon as they tend to be missing from all sort of sources. You can utilize the next 300 words to retouch details about vehicles, vendors, etc. based upon user requests.

It seems that Jason Smith is the contact point for the project, however note the organization could do a better job at
